DOC.brief_summary: To examine whether daily supplement docosahexaenoic acid throughout first year life may speed achievement gross motor development milestone healthy infant , total 1160 healthy infant randomly allocate receive throughout first year life daily oral supplement vitamin D3 ( 400 IU ) plus docosahexaenoic acid ( 20 mg ) vitamin D3 ( 400 IU ) alone . Primary outcome measure : time achieve gross motor development milestone . Secondary outcome measure : time achieve early fine motor development milestone language .
DOC.brief_title: Docosaexahenoic Acid Gross Motor Milestones Infants
DOC.criteria: weight birth equal 2500 g ; gestational age 37 42 complete week ; single birth ; absence neonatal birth abnormality ; Apgar score great equal 7 5 ; white parent . presence neonatal disease require hospitalisation longer 7 day ; unknown father ; parent unable understand protocol requirement fill infant diary ; infant already enrol select another clinical study .
